alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 31 at 11:31AM EDT until March 31 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 85 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE MADISON TAYLOR IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, ASHTON, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOWENS MILL, BOYD, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHERRY LAKE, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, DAY, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, FITZGERALD, FITZGERALD MUNICIPAL A/P, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HOPEWELL, IRWINVILLE, JARROTT, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OCILLA, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUEENSLAND, QUITMAN, TEETERVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WATERLOO, WEBER, AND WESTWOOD.
